snippet: William C. Thompson Jr. has received endorsements from several local politicians in the borough, whose demographics are crucial to his mayoral campaign.
abstract: Trailside blog; New York City Democratic mayoral candidate William C Thompson Jr is greeted with celebrity's welcome at senior center in Bronx, where he has received endorsements from several local politicians.
lead_paragraph: William C. Thompson Jr. has received endorsements from several local politicians in the borough, whose demographics are crucial to his mayoral campaign.

headline.main: Thompson Winning Friends in the Bronx
